name: Emerald
blurb: Reactivate a derelict spaceship in zero-G. Experience memories from your past. A story-based action-adventure game for PC, Mac & Linux.

rewards.reward: "Emerald Level". Get a DRM-free copy of the game upon release. Release is aiming for February 13th, 2014. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Supporter.

"Echoes Level". Get a DRM-free copy of the game upon release. Release is aiming for February 13th, 2014. Plus, get the soundtrack, as soon as this campaign is successfully finished. Finally, get one high-res desktop wallpaper. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, the OST, high-res wallpaper ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Supporter.

"Alpha Level". Get the prototype! Within two months of this Kickstarter campaign finishing, get a build of the game ready to play on PC or Mac. Note that this is an optimized version of the build used in the video, and is totes a work-in-progress. Includes full game on release (est. Feb 13th 2014), and the soundtrack at Kickstarter campaign complete. Also includes TWO high-res desktop wallpapers. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Supporter.

"Log.txt Level". Get a series of digital documents including crew logs, Ship status reports, and memoirs from before the Ship left Home. Gives deeper, clearer insight into the story of Emerald. Delivered approximately one month before game launch. ALSO, includes "Encrypted Gemstones: the Emerald Developer Diary", a .pdf with pictures, diagrams and info regarding the game design and development process of Emerald! FINALLY, includes three of twenty-five secret game codes (cheats, unlockables, mods, etc), unique to this Kickstarter campaign, delivered at game launch. Includes all previous reward tiers, of course. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, Ship documents (audio logs, status reports, tech info, maps, etc), developer diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Contributor.

"krangGAMES Abettor Level". Seven experimental games! Curiosity Killed The Mars, DotGuy vs. The Galaxy, Grand Theft Minimal, I Want To Live Forever, Lemurball, Little Running Fellow, and Shippit. ALSO, get first notification when development begins on krangGAMES' next major project, Overworld. ALSO ALSO, get the first Overworld playable prototype when it's ready! 7x Games delivered with "Log.txt" content, Overworld stuff delivered as it's ready (sometime in 2014). Show support not just for Emerald, but for krangGAMES as a whole! Includes all previous reward tiers. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, 7x Experimental krangGAMES Game, Overworld first news and prototype, Ship documents (audio logs, status reports, tech info, maps, etc), developer diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PLEASE NOTE: The Game Pack is ALSO AVAILABLE IN ALL THE FOLLOWING REWARD TIERS AS WELL! I just can't edit their descriptions after they've been backed, but Personal Trust Level and above also includes the Game Pack. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Contributor.

"Personal Trust Level". Customize your version of Emerald! Get TWO specially dedicated versions of Emerald, with a unique intro sequence. This new intro is an animated, interactive dream sequence that is custom tailored to immerse you - specifically YOU - into Emerald right from the start. Since it includes TWO customized versions of Emerald, you can customize one for yourself and the second as a gift. Emerald is a deep, story based game - if you have any friends who enjoy thoughtful stories, this would make a good gift for them. Includes all previous reward tiers. Please add $15 per additional custom gift copy. More details found in Project Update #4. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: Two DRM-free customized copies of Emerald, Ship documents (audio logs, status reports, tech info, maps, etc), developer diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PLEASE NOTE: The customized versions are ALSO AVAILABLE IN ALL THE FOLLOWING REWARD TIERS AS WELL! I just can't edit their descriptions after they've been backed, but Cartographer Level and above also include these customized versions. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Prime Contributor.

"Cartographer Level". Get a signed 16"x12" poster with "the Ship" image, a detailed map of the Ship. See reference image in the campaign description. Signed on the back, unless you request otherwise. Please add $10 for non-Canada shipping (sorry U.S. folks, it's YOUR time to pay a bit extra for once!) Ships within a month of campaign completion. Includes all previous reward tiers. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, 16x12" printed map of the Ship, Ship documents, dev diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as an Assistant Producer (AssProd).

"Terminal Level". Get a signed 24"x36" poster with the "Terminal" image on it (note shipping details at Cartographer Level). See reference image in campaign description. Signed on the back, unless you request otherwise. Includes all previous reward tiers, including the "Cartographer" poster. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, 24x36" Terminal poster, 16x12" map, Ship documents, dev diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as an Assistant Producer (AssProd).

"In Memoriam Level". Be featured in-game in the Ship's Memory Banks. The Memory Banks digitally memorialize all persons of note regarding the history of the Ship. Past crew members, old lovers and friends, strategic investors, old skilled enemies, or anything else besides. Customize your appearance and history, and help me encrypt your data. Includes all previous reward tiers including both posters (note shipping details at Cartographer Level). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, appear in-game in the Memory Banks with custom appearance and impactful history, 24x36" Terminal poster, 16x12" map, Ship documents, dev diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Development Producer (DevProd).

"Fated Crewman Level". Be featured in-game, as one of the crew members aboard the Ship. Write your own crew log, and add your own personal touch to the calamity that rendered the Ship derelict. Limited to SEVEN positions. Includes all previous reward tiers including both posters (note shipping details at Cartographer Level). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, appear in-game as a crew member, 24x36" Terminal poster, 16x12" map, Ship documents, dev diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Development Producer (DevProd).

"Luminous Flux Level". Get the "Luminous Flux" Gallery Book, a physical book which features printed editions of every piece of artwork from Emerald, all the postcard images, all the promotional artwork, and a few screenshots from in-game. Includes all previous reward tiers (note shipping details at Cartographer Level). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, "Luminous Flux" physical art book, 15+ postcards, appear in-game in the Memory Banks, 24x36" Terminal poster, 16x12" map, Ship documents, dev diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, ten high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Development Producer (DevProd).

"Extrasolar Beauty Level". Get everything at the $125 "Luminous Flux" Level, PLUS a signed Emerald "Lumens" Movie-style Poster (pictured in the description). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, 24x36" "Lumens" Poster, "Luminous Flux" physical art book, 15+ postcards, appear in-game in the Memory Banks, 24x36" Terminal poster, 16x12" map, Ship documents, dev diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, ten high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as a Development Producer (DevProd).

"XO Level". Be featured in-game as the ranking Executive Officer aboard the Ship. On top of writing your own crew log, help me add three encrypted messages to the ship's subsystems that industrious players will have to uncover. I'll help you encrypt it, but it'll for real be hidden under multiple layers of cryptography. Limited to ONE position. Includes all previous reward tiers (note shipping details at Cartographer Level). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Summary: DRM-free copy of Emerald, appear in-game as the Ship's Commanding Officer, 24x36" Terminal poster, 16x12" map, Ship documents, dev diary, three secret codes, early access prototype, the OST, two high-res wallpapers ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name is credited in-game as an Executive Producer (ExProd).

The One ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ YOU are the one who tipped Emerald onto the stretch goal I am most excited for - the "Hire A Cryptography Consultant" tier. Creating this tier is a risk - will this pledge be backed?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The events of Emerald are all tied to one event, one extremely important past event that happened hundreds of years prior to Emerald. That event was caused by one individual, who affected the course of history significantly. You get to be that individual, and be featured as one of the most important people in the Emerald universe - including any other games that are made within that same universe (which there very likely will be WINK WINK).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Of course this includes all previous rewards, and don't worry about shipping costs! I'll work closely with you to fit you into the mythos of Emerald, and all other games in the Emerald universe. Credited in-game as an Executive Producer (ExProd).
